attributes.action: This is a petition to stop all thes minor petitions!!
attributes.background: This is a petition to stop all these petitions and make only ones with a viable topic eg- (ones that will proberly reach more than 100,000). We all love cats and hedgehogs but the goverment have a lot on their plate at the minute leave them alone

rejection.details: It's not clear what "minor petitions" means.
